common_0310_rival_01:
Oh yeah—battling can wait. I meant to tell you...\c
Did you know your phone’s map app lets you set
yourself destinations?[npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_02:
You could try setting one of the Gyms as your
destination! That’d get you on your way easy![npcn:4]
common_0310_friend_01:
Tch! How’s that for a student council president!
Giving your own friends an insider advantage?[npcn:6]
common_0310_rival_04:
[BD06:0]Insider advantage? Sheesh, you make it sound
like we’re cheating or something!\c
All I did was suggest that [s:g]he check out the
Gyms. It’s up to [trnm:0]\r
whether\r
[s:g]he goes.[npcn:4]
common_0310_friend_02:
[BD06:0][trnm:0]’s gonna have h[is;er:g]
hands\r
full\r
searching\r
out\r
Titan\r
Pokémon\r
with me.\c
[H;Sh:g]e doesn’t have time to waste on something like
chasing after the Champion Rank.[npcn:6]
common_0310_friend_03:
Me and h[im;er:g] are gonna be too busy visiting the
lairs of Titans and nabbing their Herba Mystica![npcn:6]
common_0310_rival_05:
En serio? Don’t go filling h[is;er:g] head with
weird stories![npcn:4]
common_0310_friend_04:
Hey! All I did was invite h[im;er:g] along. It’s still up to
[trnm:0] whether [s:g]he goes, right?[npcn:6]
common_0310_botan_02:
It’s about Operation Starfall. Remember what
I told you before?[npcn:9]
common_0310_botan_03:
Team Star is made up of five individual squads.
And each one’s got their own base.[npcn:9]
common_0310_botan_04:
I need you to go to each base—all five of ’em—
and beat the squad boss there.[npcn:9]
common_0310_botan_05:
Team Star’s grunts might try to get in your way,
but I’ll be helping you out...from a distance.[npcn:9]
common_0310_botan_06:
And heads-up that the bosses each specialize in
a different Pokémon type. Just remember the\r
names of their crews, and you’ll figure it out.\c
Still, no need to worry. With your skills, I’m sure
you’re more than up to the task.[npcn:9]
common_0310_botan_07:
I’ll just go ahead and add the bases’ locations to
your phone for you.[npcn:9]
common_0310_botan_08:
Good luck with those bosses. I’ll hook you up
with some nice rewards every time you beat one.[npcn:9]
common_0310_rival_07:
[BD06:0]Wait one second! Who are you supposed to be?!
And Team Star—those punks are a serious hazard!\r
They’re not [trnm:0]’s\r
problem![npcn:4]
common_0310_friend_06:
That’s right! Because [s:g]he’s got more important
things to do, like searching out awesome\r
ingredients with me![npcn:6]
common_0310_botan_09:
[BD06:0]I thought it was up to [trnm:0]
to\r
decide\r
whether\r
[s:g]he\r
goes\r
or not...\r
Wasn’t\r
that\r
what\r
you\r
said,\r
Nemona?\r
And Arven?[npcn:9]
common_0310_botan_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing what you can pull
off, [trnm:0]. Bye.[npcn:9]
common_0310_rival_09:
[BD06:0][trnm:0]... I’m glad you’re
making\r
plenty\r
of\r
friends\r
here,\r
but\r
try\r
not\r
to\r
get\r
dragged\r
into\r
anything\r
dangerous.[npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_10:
Anyway! No more weird vibes—we’ve got a big
adventure to start![npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_11:
I’m gonna battle every single Pokémon Trainer
I meet![npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_12:
If I just keep trying to become the strongest,
I bet that experience will be the thing I treasure![npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_13:
Guess I’ll start by heading to a Gym and training
up some new Pokémon! Here, I’ll send you a pic\r
of what the Gym buildings look like![npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_14:
Oh, and...\c
I know we’ve been running our mouths, but it’s
your call what you do, [trnm:0].\c
Go where you want, and do what it is you really
wanna do the most![npcn:4]
common_0310_friend_09:
For me, that’s got to be Ma— Er, my big dream
of tracking down the Herba Mystica, that is![npcn:6]
common_0310_friend_11:
Once we get those herbs, I’ll make you the
absoluuute best sandwich you’ve had in your life![npcn:6]
common_0310_friend_12: Argh! What’d you come out for?[npcn:6]
common_0310_rival_16:
Oh my gosh! Did it just come out ’cause you said
“sandwich”? Hahaha![npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_17:
It seems like it wants to start moving... Is it telling
you to get on, [trnm:0]?[npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_18:
Whoa, it transformed! Now it REALLY looks like
some kinda weird Cyclizar![npcn:4]
common_0310_rival_19:
Long as you’ve got [pknm:1], you can go
pretty much anywhere. Paldea’s your Cloyster![npcn:4]
common_0310_friend_15:
Well, if you’re going to search for those Titan
Pokémon, I’d say set out from the east gate![npcn:6]
common_0310_rival_21:
[BD06:0]But since [trnm:0] is ACTUALLY
headed\r
to\r
take\r
on\r
some\r
Gyms,\r
I’d\r
say\r
go\r
for\r
the\r
west gate!\c
Besides, it’s way too easy to get lost out east![npcn:4]
common_0310_friend_10:
Tch! Man, this is why I can’t get along with you...
I’m out of here! Catch up soon, little buddy![npcn:6]
common_0310_rival_20:
[BD06:0]I’ll head to a Gym. See you around,
[trnm:0]![npcn:4]
